metadata.name: Imam Khomeini #1
metadata.description: Art #1 of Imam Khomeini NFT Collection, containing 4000 digital images with subject of Imam Khomeini and Islamic Revolution of Iran. Imam Khomeini was the founder and first leader of Islamic Republic of Iran.
